headline.main: ADMIRAL AT TOULON REPORTED CAPTIVE; Nazis Intern de la Borde as a Civilian French Naval Sources in Spain Say STORY OF SCUTTLING TOLD Chief Said to Have Made Plans Months Ago -- 'Even Harbor Tugboats' Listed Sunk

lead_paragraph: BARCELONA, Spain, Nov. 30 (AP) -- Aral Jean de la Borde, commander of the French Home Fleet, who gave the orders for the mass scuttling at Toulon last Friday, is in the hands of the Germans, French naval sources said tonight.
abstract: Adm de la Borde reptd held by Gers at Aix-en-Provence; naval sources give fleet scuttling details; traveler, arrived in Berne, describes Toulon scene
snippet: BARCELONA, Spain, Nov. 30 (AP) -- Aral Jean de la Borde, commander of the French Home Fleet, who gave the orders for the mass scuttling at Toulon last Friday, is in the hands of the Germans, French naval sources said tonight....
